divs: Sighting Details (you can type over theseinstructions.)Please limit your narrative to 500 words (equivalent to 1 typedpage). Crossing yard from dtrs house, saw BIG bright light in W sky - far toobig to be star, and no plane could hover in same spot for 45 min. object changedsize and suddenly dropped straight down, we signaled with portable searchlightand object light changed color from yellow to blu-white to red and back toyellow. Object pulsed, NOT twinkled. lights alternately brightened and dimmed. Watched until object slowly disappeared over western horizon. Object seemed tobe v shaped set of lights.
